resources.string:
Welcome to ptMobile. Getting started:

On the pivotaltracker Website:

1) Go to "My Profile" and create an API-Token (don't worry, you don't need to type it on your mobile)

2) Make sure that the projects you want to access from ptMobile have API access enabled

In ptMobile:

 3) Press "Menu" >> "Preferences" and fetch and save your API-Token using your pivotaltracker username and password.

Have fun.

ptMobile is a simple pivotaltracker client for android.

Since this is an early release, ptMobile is lacking some important features at the moment.

Feedback, bug reports, feature requests are always welcome.

Yours
Niels

Visit me on www.linnemann.me/ptMobile
Thanks to:\n- pivotallabs for constantly improving pivotaltracker\n- Dennis Pollack, who created the ptMobile Logo
